14#ifndef NAMED_TSIGCONF_H
15#define NAMED_TSIGCONF_H 1
16
17/*! \file */
18
19#include <isc/types.h>
20#include <isc/lang.h>
21
22ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
23
24isc_result_t
25named_tsigkeyring_fromconfig(const cfg_obj_t *config, const cfg_obj_t *vconfig,
26 isc_mem_t *mctx, dns_tsig_keyring_t **ringp);
27/*%<
28 * Create a TSIG key ring and configure it according to the 'key'
29 * statements in the global and view configuration objects.
30 *
31 * Requires:
32 * \li 'config' is not NULL.
33 * \li 'vconfig' is not NULL.
34 * \li 'mctx' is not NULL
35 * \li 'ringp' is not NULL, and '*ringp' is NULL
36 *
37 * Returns:
38 * \li ISC_R_SUCCESS
39 * \li ISC_R_NOMEMORY
40 */
41
42ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
43
44#endif /* NAMED_TSIGCONF_H */
